Antique Cuirass.name: Antique Cuirass
Antique Cuirass.description: Counter to physical type damage, general counter against MM and Assasins

passives.name: Deter
passives.description: When hit by an enemy hero's skill, reduces their Physical ATK by 6% for 2s (up to 3 stacks).

Arcane Boots.name: Arcane Boots
Arcane Boots.description: Focus on Magic based damage skills\attack

Athena's Shield.name: Athena's Shield
Athena's Shield.description: Counter against heroes with burst type skills magic attack. Ex, Pharsa, Eudora, Kadita etc. A must if you're low HP Hero against assasins like Gusion.

passives.name: Shield
passives.description: Can be triggered when taking Magic Damage. Reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 3s (including the Magic Damage that triggers this effect). You will be able to trigger this effect again after leaving combat for 5s.

Azure Blade.name: Azure Blade
Azure Blade.subname: Mana Regen and CD reduction. Good early equipment for mages.
Azure Blade.description: Good early equipment for mages. Have CD and Mana Regen with added True Damage.

passives.name: Judgement
passives.description: Attacks in 3s after a spell will add 50 true damage. Cooldown 1.5s.

Berserker's Fury.name: Berserker's Fury
Berserker's Fury.description: Best pair to amplify Windtalker or Scarlet Phantom damage and effect.

passives.name: Doom
passives.description: Critical strikes increases the hero's Physical Attack by 5% for 2s.

passives.name: Unique Attribute
passives.description: 40% Critical Damage

Black Ice Shield.name: Black Ice Shield
Black Ice Shield.description: Good basic Equipment against Fast Attacking heroes. Buy first before Steel Legplates for Dominance Ice

passives.name: Artic Cold
passives.description: Reduces nearby hero Attack Speed by 85% of normal

Blade Armor.name: Blade Armor
Blade Armor.description: Best Counter against MM due to Damage Reflection and 15% Slow

passives.name: Bladed Armor
passives.description: When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 20% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus 20% of the hero's Physical Defense to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.

passives.name: Unique Attribute
passives.description: 20% Critical Damage Reduction

Blade of Despair.name: Blade of Despair
Blade of Despair.description: Enhances Physical Damage Like Blood Wings to Mage

passives.name: Despair
passives.description: Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes effect before damage is dealt)

Blade of the Heptaseas.name: Blade of the Heptaseas
Blade of the Heptaseas.description: Early damage and slow option for ganking

passives.name: Ambush
passives.description: If no damage is dealt or taken from enemy heroes within 5s, the next Basic Attack deals 160 plus 40% Physical Attack as extra Physical Damage and slows the target by 40% for 1.5s.

passives.name: Unique Attribute
passives.description: 15 Physical Penetration

Bloodlust Axe.name: Bloodlust Axe
Bloodlust Axe.description: Good sustain for hero who Spam Skills like Balmond and Baxia

passives.name: Unique Attribute
passives.description: 20% Spell Vamp

Blood Wings.name: Blood Wings
Blood Wings.description: Highest Magic Damage and Mobility with Shields

passives.name: Guard
passives.description: Gain a Shield equal to 200% Magic Power. Shields regenerate back after 20s after damaged. Shields also grant 30 Movement speed.

Boots.name: Boots
Boots.description: Basic footwear, Few heroes can go barefooted on the land of Dawn.

Broken Heart.name: Broken Heart
Broken Heart.subname: Immune to Allied Cecillion Moonlit Waltz

Brute Force Breastplate.name: Brute Force Breastplate
Brute Force Breastplate.subname: Stackable Attack Damage and Movement Speed. Additional CD reduction at full stacks
Brute Force Breastplate.description: Attack oriented Defence Equipment. Trigger effect after an attack.

passives.name: Brute Force
passives.description: Each seconds after dealing damage, gains extra 6 Physical Attack & Magic Power. And Movement Speed by 2% For 4seconds, Up to 6 StacksGains 15% extra CD Reduction at full Stacks.

Clock of Destiny.name: Clock of Destiny
Clock of Destiny.description: Buy Early, Good equip for Magic Burst Damager.

passives.name: Time
passives.description: Time: Adds 20 Max HP and 4 Magic Power every 20s. Up to 15 times

passives.name: Reincarnate
passives.description: If Time reaches Max Stacks, then the hero will receive extra 5% Magic Power and 600 Max Mana.

Conceal.name: Conceal
Conceal.description: Best strategy to blitzkrieg/ambush as Speed & Maps wouldn't show concealed Heroes

passives.name: Thriving
passives.description: After purchase, you can no longer gain Gold and EXP from minions and creeps and must collect 600 Gold from Roaming Equipment to unlock this skill (up to 1500 Gold).

Concentrated Energy.name: Concentrated Energy
Concentrated Energy.description: Its for Spell Vamp not magic attack!

passives.name: Recharge
passives.description: Increase Magic Power by 5 by dealing Magic Damage. Stacks 6 times between 0.4s. Upon Full Stacks increase Magic Damage by 12% for 3s

passives.name: Unique Attribute
passives.description: 20% Spell Vamp

Corrosion Scythe.name: Corrosion Scythe
Corrosion Scythe.description: Slow Enemy.  Additionally gains stackable additional physical damage and attack speed.

passives.name: Corrosion
passives.description: Basic Attack deals 80 extra physical damage to enemies & reduces the target's Movement Speed by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacks up to 5 times.

passives.name: Impulse
passives.description: Basic Attack deals 6% extra attack speed. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 3s.

Cursed Helmet.name: Cursed Helmet
Cursed Helmet.description: Emit Damage in its presence per second. Scale with Hero Max HP.

passives.name: Burning Soul
passives.description: Deals Magic Damage equal to 1.2% of hero's Max HP per second to nearby enemies. This damage is increased by 140% ~ 350% against creeps & minions. Scale with level

Demon Hunter Sword.name: Demon Hunter Sword
Demon Hunter Sword.description: Damage proportional to target HP. Bigger enemy HP, Bigger our Damage.

passives.name: Devour
passives.description: Basic attacks will deal 8% of the target's current HP as additional physical damage (up to 60 against creeps and minions).

passives.name: Devour
passives.description: Basic Attack grants 3% Lifesteal for 3s. Stack up to 5 times.

Demon Shoes.name: Demon Shoes
Demon Shoes.description: +6 Mana Regen Faster with kills or farm

passives.name: Mysticism
passives.description: Restores 10% Max Mana on hero kills or assists and 4% on minion kills.

passives.name: Dire Hit
passives.description: Every 30s, the next damage against enemy hero with HP drop below 35% deals extra damage equal to 7%-18% of the target's Max HP (hybrid damage, scales with Gold from Thriving

passives.name: Thriving
passives.description: After purchase, you can no longer gain Gold and EXP from minions and creeps and must collect 600 Gold from Roaming Equipment to unlock this skill (up to 1500 Gold).

Divine Glaive.name: Divine Glaive
Divine Glaive.description: Scale with enemy magic defence. Deliver max damage earlier since its capped at 20%

passives.name: Spellbreaker
passives.description: Each point of the enemy's Magic Defense increases Magic Penetration by 0.1% when dealing damage to it, capped at 20%.

passives.name: Unique Attribute
passives.description: 40% Magic Penetration

Dominance Ice.name: Dominance Ice
Dominance Ice.description: Best counter against high attack speed or sustain enemy heroes. Can pair with Blade Armor and Vengence against MM.

passives.name: Arctic Cold
passives.description: Reduces the Attack Speed of nearby enemy heroes by 70% of Normal.

passives.name: Lifebane
passives.description: Reduces shield and HP regen of nearby enemy heroes to 50% of Normal

Dreadnaught Armor.name: Dreadnaught Armor
Dreadnaught Armor.subname: Enemy spell activate stackable Physical Defense
Dreadnaught Armor.description: Earlier Defence against fast Attackers like MM, cheaper Antique Cuirass

passives.name: Deter
passives.description: When hit by a skill reduces Attacker's Physical Damage by 4% for 2s. Stacks 3 times

Elegant Gem.name: Elegant Gem
Elegant Gem.description: Good Mage Equipment to sustain earlier. Regenerate mana and HP by 20% after leveling up. Build Path to Clock of Destiny and Necklace of Durance

passives.name: Gift
passives.description: Regenerates 20% Max HP and Mana over 2s after Level up

Enchanted Talisman.name: Enchanted Talisman
Enchanted Talisman.description: Early Equipment for Mana hungry mage. Regenerate 15% max mana every 10s

passives.name: Mana Spring
passives.description: Regenerates 15% of Max Mana every 10s in total.

passives.name: Magic Mastery
passives.description: Max CD Reduction increased by 5%.

passives.name: Encourage
passives.description: Increases nearby allied heroes' Physical Attack and Magic Power by 12-30 (scales with Gold from Thriving) and Attack Speed by 15%.

passives.name: Thriving
passives.description: After purchase, you can no longer gain Gold and EXP from minions and creeps and must collect 600 Gold from Roaming Equipment to unlock this skill (up to 1500 Gold).

Endless Battle.name: Endless Battle
Endless Battle.description: Versatile Physical weapon. Utilize by chaining basic attack between spells.

passives.name: Divine Justice
passives.description: In 3s after using the skill, the caster's next Basic Attack will deal additional True Damage as much as 60% of Physical Attack with a cooldown of 1.5s.

passives.name: Chase Fate
passives.description: When Divine Justice's effect is triggered, it will increase the hero's movement speed by 10%.

Exotic Veil.name: Exotic Veil
Exotic Veil.description: Good Early item for Magic Damage and Movement. Build path for Glowing and Genius Wand.

Favor.name: Favor
Favor.description: Extra Healing with healing and shield

passives.name: Favor
passives.description: Every 10s, the next healing or shield skill restores an extra 300-750 HP (scales with Gold from Thriving) for the allied hero with the lowest HP within 5 yards. Skills that only take effect on self cannot trigger this effect.

passives.name: Thriving
passives.description: After purchase, you can no longer gain Gold and EXP from minions and creeps and must collect 600 Gold from Roaming Equipment to unlock this skill (up to 1500 Gold).

passives.name: Affliction
passives.description: Basic Attacks deal extra Magic Damage equal to 50 plus 30% Magic Power.

passives.name: Impulse
passives.description: Basic Attack grant 6% extra Attack Speed for 3s. Capped at 3 stacks

passives.name: Unique Attribute
passives.description: +12% Healing Effect

passives.name: Blessing
passives.description: When casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below 35% or falls below 35% within 5s, they will get a 660-1500 shield that last 3s. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2s.This effect only triggers once every 60s on the same target, and will not trigger on self-only healingand shield skills.

passives.name: Timestream
passives.description: Hero kills or assists reduce Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.

passives.name: Unique Attribute
passives.description: 12 Physical Penetration

Genius Wand.name: Genius Wand
Genius Wand.description: Best for Multi-stage magic Attackers like Nana 3 stomp. first stomp can reduce magic defence for even grater damage the 2nd stomp. Also her Boomerang.

passives.name: Magic
passives.description: Dealing damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 3-7 for 2s (the Defense reduction scales with level). Stacks up to 3 times

passives.name: Unique Attribute
passives.description: 10 Magic Penetration

passives.name: Scorch
passives.description: Magic Damage will burn the targets for 3s, dealing 1.5% of the target's Max HP as Magic Damage per second. Stackable to 6 times by 2-4 (Scales with Level)

passives.name: Unique Attribute
passives.description: 5% Movement Speed

passives.name: Swift
passives.description: Unable to increase critical chance. Every 1% of critical chance gained will increase attack speed by 1%.

passives.name: Endless Strike
passives.description: After every 2 non-critical Basic Attacks, Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 100%(Attack Speed Cap is increased to 500%) and its effects is triggered an additional 2 times.

Great Dragon Spear.name: Great Dragon Spear
Great Dragon Spear.subname: Best Attack with Critical Chance and CD reduction. Passive Triggered by Ultimate

passives.name: Supreme Warrior
passives.description: After Casting Ultimate Spells Adds Movement Speed by 15% for 7.5s.15s Cooldown

passives.name: Recovery
passives.description: Regenerates 2.5% Max HP per second (reduced to 0.5% Max HP per second over 5s after taking damage).

passives.name: Frenzy
passives.description: Critical strike Trigger additional 20% Attack Speed for 2s

passives.name: Unique Attribute
passives.description: 25% Lifesteal

passives.name: Mystery
passives.description: Increase magic attack by 21%-35% (Scales with level).

Hunter Strike.name: Hunter Strike
Hunter Strike.description: Assasins and MM with fast attack can capitalize on the passive greatly

passives.name: Retribution
passives.description: Deals damage to an enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row and increases Movement Speed by 50% that decays rapidly over 3s. This efect has a 8s cooldown.

passives.name: Unique Attribute
passives.description: 15 physical Penetration

passives.name: Ice Bound
passives.description: Skills hits Slow enemy hero by 15%. This effect lasts 3s. Stackable to 2 times.

Immortality.name: Immortality
Immortality.description: Valueable Late Game equipment to rectify mistakes

passives.name: Immortal
passives.description: Resurrect in 2.5s after death and gets 16% HP and 220-1200 shield that lasts for 3s. (Scales with hero level). Cooldown of 210s.

Lantern of Hope.name: Lantern of Hope
Lantern of Hope.description: would Evolved from Shimmering Lantern once Floryn Accumulated 1000 energy stacks

passives.name: Lantern of Hope
passives.description: Floryn's Dew Lantern Skills are Enhanced and shared Equipments also revealed its true power.

Lightning Truncheon.name: Lightning Truncheon
Lightning Truncheon.description: High Burst Damage Early Game. Scales with Max Mana

passives.name: Resonate
passives.description: Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing 50-1000 Additional Magic Damage (scales with Max Mana) to up to 3 enemies

Magic Blade.subname: Early Defence against Burst and magic

passives.name: Lifeline
passives.description: Upon receive Burst damage to HP below 30%. Gain 420-910 Shield(Increases with Level) and 50% Movement Speed Decays in 3s. Cooldown 60s

passives.name: Unique Passive
passives.description: For 120s gains 30 extra Magic Power and 5% Cooldown reduction

Magic Wand.name: Magic Wand

passives.description: Each point of the enemy's Physical Defense increases Physical Penetration by 0.125% when dealing damage to it, capped at 40%

passives.description: 20% Physical Penetration

passives.name: Burning Soul
passives.description: Deals Magic Damage equal to 0.6% of your Max HP per second to nearby enemies. Damage can go up to140%-350% against creeps and minion(scaleable with level)

Necklace of Durance.name: Necklace of Durance

Necklace of Durance.description: Mage Equipment to Counter Sustain/Lifesteal Enemy Hero

passives.description: Upon dealing damage to the target, reduces Shield and HP Regen of the target by 50% of normal for 3s.

passives.name: Gift
passives.description: Regenerates 20% max HP and mana over 2s after leveling up

Ogre Tomahawk.name: Ogre Tomahawk

Ogre Tomahawk.description: Good HP and damage best to chase enemy earlier on. Build path to Endless Battle.

passives.name: Bless
passives.description: Shields and HP regeneration effect improved by 30%.

Power Potion.name: Power Potion

passives.description: For 120s gains 30 Physical Attack and 15% Lifesteal.

Queen's Wings.name: Queen's Wings

passives.description: when health is less than 40% reduces damage taken by 20% and increases your Spell Vamp by 35% for 5s. Cooldown 60s.

Radiant Armor.name: Radiant Armor

passives.name: Side Effect

passives.name: Lifeline
passives.description: Trigger when HP drop to 30%. gains 840-1820 shield and 50% movement speed that quickly decay.Cooldown 60s and Scalable by level.

Sea Halberd.name: Sea Halberd
Sea Halberd.description: Best for Physical damage Dealer & gains additional Attack Speed

passives.name: Life Drain
passives.description: Upon dealing damage to the target, reduces Shield and HP Regen of the target by 50% for 3s.

Shimmering Lantern.name: Shimmering Lantern

passives.name: Dew Lantern

Silence Robe.name: Silence Robe
Silence Robe.description: Base Item for Athena or Oracle

Starlium Scythe.name: Starlium Scythe
Starlium Scythe.description: Revamp from Calamity Reaper, Versatile Mage Attack Item

passives.name: Crisis
passives.description: After casting a skill, the next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 100 + 100% Magic Power as extra True Damage and grants 10% extra Movement Speed. (1.5 seconds cooldown).

Steel Legplates.name: Steel Legplates
Steel Legplates.description: Best Early Defence as base item for Dominance or Blade Armor

Swift Crossbow.name: Swift Crossbow

Swift Crossbow.description: Gains 40 Adaptive Damage & stackable Attack Speed. Route to Corrosion Scythe or Feather of Heaven

passives.name: Crossbow
passives.description: Basic Attack adds 40 Adaptive Damage

passives.name: Impulse
passives.description: Basic Attack adds 3% extra Attack Speed for 3s. Stackable 5 times.

Thunder Belt.name: Thunder Belt
Thunder Belt.description: Higher HP grant Higher splash damage and Slow

passives.name: Thunderbolt
passives.description: After casting skill, Basic Attack gains 50 + (5% of your HP) to target and its nearby allies. They will be Slow by 40%-80% for 1s. Scalable by your current HP.Cooldown 1.5s.

Tome of Evil.name: Tome of Evil
Tome of Evil.subname: Small Mana Regen, but good Magic damage & CD

Tough Boots.name: Tough Boots
Tough Boots.description: Reduced CC effect but doesn't look anywhere near to a fighter or tank shoes.

passives.name: Fortitude
passives.description: Duration of being controlled reduced by 30%

Twilight Armor.name: Twilight Armor
Twilight Armor.description: Few Item that can withstood True Damage. Limit damage taken after the first 800 damage.

passives.name: Twilight
passives.description: Upon taken 800 Damage in an instance. excess damage is reduced by 300 + (15% of your Max HP)Cooldown 5s

Vampire Mallet.name: Vampire Mallet
Vampire Mallet.description: Might've been vampire fang instead of horn. who knows...

passives.name: Valor
passives.description: For each Basic Attack received, gains 5 extra Physical Defense (up to 25) for 3s.

War Axe.name: War Axe
War Axe.subname: Stakeable Physical Attacks & Spell Vamp. Added True Damage upon full stacks
War Axe.description: Easy to make with Best Effect. Added 10% True damage at full stack. Best on Fighter

passives.name: Fighting Spirit
passives.description: Each Attack Gains 12 Physical Attack & 2% Extra Spell Vamp per second for 4 seconds up to 6 stacks. Deals 10% extra true damage according to base damage at full stacks.MM, Mage & Support only get 50% effect.

passives.name: Typhoon
passives.description: Every 5-3s (decreases as Attack Speed increases), the next Basic Attack deals Splash 150-362 Magic Damage to 3 enemies (can critically strike and deals 200% damage against minions).

passives.name: Unique Passive
passives.description: Each time Typhoon is cast, your movement speed will be increased 5% for a short time.

Wind of Nature.name: Wind of Nature

Wind of Nature.description: Best to manage Physical burst damage require Fast activation.
